description: Once you’ve found the car park, make your way to this restaurant’s small, traditional dining room where you will be warmly welcomed by the owner (a real wine enthusiast) and well looked after by his friendly yet efficient staff. Generous cuisine with plenty of attention paid to local, seasonal ingredients and daily specials that come highly recommended.
